notes: Clean and well-maintained apartment with modern fixtures including AC, TV stand, and full kitchen with gas stove, refrigerator, and dish dryer. Good natural light from large windows in living room. For baby safety: tile floors are easy to clean but slippery; no visible balcony or stairs; furniture has some sharp corners on the wooden bed frame and TV cabinet that may need padding. The kitchen floor drain visible in image 5 should be covered.
